title: Mecha Malphite Chroma W bug
body:
I bought the new chroma for mecha malphite and I've noticed on every one of the chromas (the base mecha skin is fine) the W active isn't displaying the correct animation. Instead of having the spiked knuckles, his hands just slightly glow yellow. 

Has anyone else noticed this bug? Rito fix pls. I really like the animation.

replies.body: It is still bugged. the W just glows gold around the hands. very hard to distinguish. i love that extra detail in the mecha skin. part of the reason i bought it :/
Hey! Thanks for the report! This has been resolved and should be headed out with the next patch!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ar5tuGic,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-04T20:07:49.041+0000)
>
> Hey! Thanks for the report! This has been resolved and should be headed out with the next patch!

The bug is still present...
Hm. It was resolved on our end, it's weird that it isn't in the live build. Lemme take a look again.
I tried the skin last night (day of 6.21 patch) and the bug is still there. Just a heads up.
Boo, okay. Lemme poke the folks who worked on him and see what's up! :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Ar5tuGic,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2016-10-07T17:56:03.454+0000)
>
> Hm. It was resolved on our end, it's weird that it isn't in the live build. Lemme take a look again.

Thank you for your time.

PD: maybe it won't be solved until 6.21. Anyway, let us know any news about this, please.
Thank you so much! I love the chromas for the skin, so I was really bummed when it wasnt working.
